Name: BOSS
Text: What was that? Looks as if instead of falling down the trees got marked with tags.

Name: BOSS
Text: The tags say: ''Protected by the mandate of The Ministry of the Environment''.

Name: BOSS
Text: Must be a bug in the software, jesus.

Name: BOSS
Text: You wont be able to cut down trees with those tags, so just hope the bug doesn't remanifest.
